author: bencomic

right.text: I have terrible news, Mr. Piecowye. There was an allergen found in the water.

That's not the end of it. Since this is the same water you use for the laundry... the allergen fused with the allergen left over from The Detergent, and now... now it has mutated into a superallergen.

left.text: That's alright, I can buy bottled water for now.

right.text: i was stoned at the time :/

left.text: I'm afraid the only way you can stop the superallergen is with bleach. And that'd... that'd just ruin your colours.

title: Doctor doctor, give me the news 2
